subject: Re: Ghostman video
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
Frank,

About 5 seconds in on the video to about 8 seconds they say "We Eat 
Pizza", that's what i hear anyway.  That's funny because i was doing a 
session over Skype with my sister and i told my sister i had to go and 
eat and the box said "Yeah Pizza".  They were close, i was having food 
delivered from a pizza place but i was having lasagna.  Either way i 
think they like pizza.  Maybe it's all they serve over there???

-Steve H.

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> 
wrote:
>
> 
>  This is the "Ghostman" an old digital Walkman, with a sweep 
generator,  amplifiers to drive stereo speakers, and line output for a 
recorder. My one of a kind version of the Mini Box.
>  
>  Frank-S
